name: sheetrock
description: Quickly connect to, query, and lazy-load data from Google Spreadsheets.

scripts.karma: node_modules/karma/bin/karma start test/karma-vanilla.conf.js --single-run && node_modules/karma/bin/karma start test/karma-browserify.conf.js --single-run && node_modules/karma/bin/karma start test/karma-requirejs.conf.js --single-run && node_modules/karma/bin/karma start test/karma-jquery.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run karma && npm run jasmine
